extendedInfo.description: If you have any questions, please contact me at e-mail, not in the comments.This widget will notify you about a beginning of periods by growing flower. Every your cycle the flower grows up. The clouds comes down a week before menses. If there is a rain over the flower, it means, that menses will start very soon. Calendar opens by taping on the widget. Slide on calendar left to right or right to left to see another month. Push the day if it is critical (this days are marked with red). The days of the next periods is marked with pink (it is automatically calculated). You may export data to text file on SD-card and import it. For example, if you want to migrate data to another device or make a backup. These functions are in the settings.This is free version. In full version: there is no ad, there is a support of ovulation and fertile period (good for conceiving a child). Also you may set up a password, mark sex and medication and all flowers are available.IMPORTANT This is a widget, and it is in widgets section on your phone (not in the programs). Please, be attentive.Gravitrip - my new game with plasticine graphics. Play and enjoy it!https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gravitriphttps://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=mUC_6EJEBb4

reviews.title: check this out
reviews.comment: look for the abishkKing calendar it doesn\'t have an embarrassing  name on thehome screen and its really precise look up period calender
reviews.author: Ambria Pommet

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Have had this app/widget for over a year. I like that I can use it to keep track of just one thing and view it on a simple calendar.  Most other apps had too many things to track cluttering up the calendar or were just widgets without a calendar view.  The menu button at the bottom of the screen doesn\'t always show but after I set it up I haven\'t needed to use the menu so it doesn\'t bother me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Liking this simple and subtle 2x1 widget so far. I wish there was a spotting or notes feature. Love the countdown and save to sd card features. And the 13 (not 3!) flowers and other pictures.
reviews.author: Jennifer Lamb

reviews.title: Stopped Working...
reviews.comment: This was a great app until it recently stopped working properly.  From this month on, it\'s saying I am expected to have my period for a few days each week!  Please!  God forbid!  Anyone know how to fix this?  Please help!  (I will adjust my rating (add stars) if/when fixed)
reviews.author: Mari Elle

reviews.title: Cute but frustrating
reviews.comment: When I click on it to add my periods etc the calender keeps inverting... Its like a mirror image. Like its the 13th & I clicked today for the first day of period then it flips around so it shows yesterday like the 14th today the 13th & tomorrow the 12th. & red dots started popping up randomly. Im confused. Lol
